subject: Hockey, Ice
Olympic Games (2014)
lead_paragraph: Kessel scored two of his three goals in the opening 4 minutes 33 seconds against Slovenia and became the first U.S. player with an Olympic hat trick in more than a decade.
snippet: Kessel scored two of his three goals in the opening 4 minutes 33 seconds against Slovenia and became the first U.S. player with an Olympic hat trick in more than a decade.
